name: TH Raceway
description:
- Description -

Customize and ride in this unique clay-styled 2D Racer! Keep racing to unlock new items that upgrade your car, and try to get through the three realms in under 2 minutes. Make it to the end and see what the true meaning of winning is...

- Includes -

  • Customizable vehicles so you can drive to your liking!
  • 3 Unique Realms to test and trial you
  • A cute pre-rendered clay art style
  • A grooving soundtrack

- Bio -

We are team second place.  A group of students currently studying in Auckland, New Zealand.  This game was made for a unity project and was made in the span of 8 weeks.
